es.ucm.fdi.tp.view

Class BoardUI<S extends GameState<S,A>,A extends GameAction<S,A>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • es.ucm.fdi.tp.extra.jboard.JBoard
            • es.ucm.fdi.tp.view.BoardUI<S,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - A GameState that represents the state od the board in a moment of the game
    A - A Game Action to apply to the state
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver<S,A>, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TttBoardUI, WasBoardUI

    public abstract class BoardUI<S extends GameState<S,A>,A extends GameAction<S,A>>
extends JBoard
implements GameObserver<S,A>
    Abstract class that implements the common methods and parameters for any board game.
    Version:
    1 (03/05/2017)
    Author:
    Claudia Guerrero Garc√≠a-Heras and Rafael Herrera Troca
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
